thread.title: NBA 2K16 Video - Winning Tips with Scott O'Gallagher Features DEFENSE
thread.title_full: NBA 2K16 Video - Winning Tips with Scott O'Gallagher Features DEFENSE

author: Steve_OS
title: NBA 2K16 Video - Winning Tips with Scott O'Gallagher Features DEFENSE
text: # 1 EarvGotti @ 10/24/15 07:01 PM Good stuff, but on ball defense isnt the problem. Help and Inside defense is. # 2 galanjr @ 10/24/15 08:27 PM I concur, the teammates defense is bad. There need to work on the balance of the gameplay. I hope the next patch correct this. # 3 galanjr @ 10/24/15 08:30 PM Quote: Originally Posted by galanjr I concur, the teammates defense is bad. There need to work on the balance of the gameplay. I hope the next patch correct this. Sorry for my typo. I should say, They need to fix the gameplay bugs on defense. # 4 RandomPerson @ 10/24/15 10:00 PM Holy **** Rachel is hot. # 5 DolfanDave @ 10/24/15 10:38 PM Quote: Good stuff, but on ball defense isnt the problem. Help and Inside defense is. And let not forget the elephant in the room transition defense preprogrammed logic [emoji6] Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-N900A using Tapatalk # 6 jfsolo @ 10/24/15 11:34 PM When someone tweets to OG that defense is fantastic this year and he retweets it, I feel somewhat disheartened, given the issues that exist right now.
